title: Problem Solving Toolkit üõ†Ô∏è
content:
This page is designed to help you solve problems more effectively.

The Five Steps of Problem Solving

  1. Identify and comprehend of the problem
  2. Generate potential solutions
  3. Evaluate and select the best solution
  4. Implement the solution
  5. Reflect, monitor, and adjust the solution

Strategies

Strategies are the overall approaches and plan of action used to address a problem.

  • Root cause analysis
  • SWOT analysis
  • Brainstorming

Methods

Methods are a specific approach or technique used to solve a problem.

  • Scientific method
  • Design thinking
  • Six Sigma

Tactics

Tactics are specific actions or steps that are taken as part of the strategy or method. They are the specific, concrete implementation of a strategy or method.

  • Mind mapping
  • Time management
  • Delegation

Tools

Tools are resources or instruments that are used to support the implementation of a strategy, method, or tactic.

  • Flow chart
  • Gantt chart
  • Pareto analysis

References

  1. OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-3
  2. https://www.osaka-gu.ac.jp/php/nakagawa/TRIZ/eTRIZ/eSickafusMemorial/eSickafus-TextBooks-Tutorials/HSTPBook-041111.pdf
